SEARCH
Package entity

Class Inquiry

java.lang.Object
entity.Inquiry
public class Inquiry extends Object
Represents an inquiry submitted by an applicant regarding a BTO project. Contains metadata such as subject, message, status, timestamps, and reply.

  • Constructor Details

    • Inquiry

      public Inquiry(String inquiryId, String senderNRIC, String subject, String message, String status, LocalDateTime createdAt, LocalDateTime resolvedAt, Project relatedProject)
      Constructs an Inquiry with all required fields.
      Parameters:
      inquiryId - the unique identifier of the inquiry
      senderNRIC - the NRIC of the user who submitted the inquiry
      subject - the subject or title of the inquiry
      message - the detailed message content
      status - the current status of the inquiry (e.g. open/closed)
      createdAt - the timestamp when the inquiry was created
      resolvedAt - the timestamp when the inquiry was resolved (can be null)
      relatedProject - the project this inquiry refers to (can be null)
